comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called La Belle Epoque ca.1890 - ca.1914 incl. ArtDeco and ArtNouveau, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment._content: Beauatiful shot! I love Austrailias' history!

comment.author: 55947177@N06
comment._content: I grew up in this house! From when I was a baby in 1977 to about 5 years ago. It's one of the most beautiful houses in all Toowoomba with its huge rooms and high ceilings (many with ceiling and wall pressed metal), wrap around verandahs accessed via numerous french doors and sash windows and a magical garden that takes up 1/4 acre just on its own. My parents bought it when it was a complete wreck and did it up over many years. It was a lovely surprise to accidently come across this lovely old photo.
